name: Idle Taoist Mage Warrior
description:
Game Characters:
There are three professions in the game. They are warriors, mages, and Taoists.

Professional Skills:
Each has an independent skill system.
Warrior assisted anti monster and partial output.
Mages possess powerful group spell skills.
Taoist possesses summoning skills and auxiliary skills.

Equipment system:
This game has a wealth of equipment. Currently, we have nearly 200 different pieces of equipment.
Some equipment can be used by all three professions. But most equipment must meet the corresponding profession to be worn.
The current highest level of equipment is level 40.

Combat System:
This game adopts three professional team battles.
Mutual cooperation brings endless joy.
Choose a stationary map and fight against different monsters.
All equipment comes from monster drops.
Explore the system:
This game also has rich other gameplay options such as mining and cultivation.
